categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: This Imperial commander was an Imperial officer from Kemla who was assigned as the garrison commander on the Galactic Empire's garrison on the planet Mandalore.

In 19 BBY, the commander was convinced by the Mandalorian Jarkyc that a failed theme park was a sacred Mandalorian temple. Intending to inspire awe in the local Mandalorians, the Empire bought the theme park and used it as their garrison base.
